Art and Media

Photography

A few years ago my grandfather gave me a nice camera and since then I have tried to improve my photography skills as a way to improve my artistic ability as well as a way to connect with my grandfather. I've taken a LOT of photos but here is a collection of some of my favorite images

"Reflectance" -2023
"Peachtree at Night" -2018
"Road in the Rain" -2019
"Ferris Wheel" -2018
"Beautiful Biscoff" -2017
